page.title: 20PRINCESS MARINA
page.content: Princess Marina is a hospital for the mentally and physically handicapped.It has over 300 patients and just over 30 of them are children.There are three day patients who come at 10.30 and leave at approximately 5.00p.m. During the day,the children go to the school to play with toys and games. The hospital was built in 1969 and was opened by{Princess Marina.}There are bungalows for the staff near the hospital incase anything serious happens. For the children,there is a day school with a swimming pool and apparatus and in there are lots of wards for all sorts of patients.
